body: Hello community, I am having trouble solving adjacent zones - and I am wondering what I am doing wrong - external walls are defined as internal walls, roofs as ceiling and vice-versa. As this works perfectly when everything is straight and overlapping - how do you deal with over hangs ? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/plrPJj-5FY-Is8B2RaZ7w7W1A9tHrC8O7MOUSwOAiMtGaqnIgLMRwDUM9ZRB87lAzSebzUZdM5aWJpIFURKntTtTmaM6aCuV/adjecencies.JPG) Any hints and suggestions appreciated - I have added the file down below for who feels helpful.
